detail_desc: Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a collar. Press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, patch front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Knee-length dress in silk with a lightly brushed finish. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover, short, wide sleeves, seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back where they have a wide lace trim, and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length skirt in jersey made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a glossy finish. Concealed elastic gore in one side and pointed toes. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch satin made from a cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Sandals in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the front, an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric. Wide fit with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
A pair of large hoop earrings made of steel and recycled zinc. Diameter 6.5 cm.
Short skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative flounces. Unlined.
Top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a sheen. Collar, V-neck and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Calf-length shirt dress in silk with a soft, crêpe finish and a knot detail that adds fullness and structure to the front. Pleats for added width at the back and long sleeves with pleats and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Rounded hem.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Hat in braided paper straw with a band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Longer, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, long sleeves with inner ribbing and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button and zip fly. Elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed drawstring, side pockets, a zipped welt back pocket, and short slits in the sides of the hems.
Cropped, bralette-style top in soft imitation leather with a square neckline front and back, concealed zip at the back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Lined.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Double-breasted coat in a sturdy weave with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Airy blouse in a modal weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the front and on the shoulders, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs.

Short blouse in airy chiffon made from recycled polyester with a wide neckline and pleats at the top. Low dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an open back with decorative gathers and ties. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch imitation leather with a high waist, a fly with visible press-studs and a small, zipped front pocket. Slim legs with seams front and back and a zip at the hems.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft viscose-blend knit with a V-neck and inset lace section at the back. Long sleeves with a wide lace edge at the end.
Calf-length, pleated dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck with a drawstring at the front, long sleeves with a seam and flounce at the cuffs, and a flounced hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Straight cut with a slit in one side. Unlined.
Blouse in a soft weave with a small collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved all-in-one-suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Shirt in an organic weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam with a drawstring under the bust.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy twill with a zip and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back and straight legs with sewn-in creases.
Calf-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt and concealed side pockets. Unlined.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with inset lace trims at the front and ties at the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined skirt.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Shorts in sturdy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and back pockets.
Loose-fitting, sports vest top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Long sleeves with two covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Slim-fit, high-waisted trousers in a stretch weave with a reinforced waistband and hook-and-eye fastening. Zip at the front and tapered legs with decorative seams.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets and gently tapered legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy, textured, striped weave with a stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the top and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the top and hem and narrow, ribbed shoulder straps.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x170 cm.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
LIMITED EDITION. Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Yoke, sleeves and hem in broderie anglaise with a scalloped edge.

Knee-length coat in soft, felted fabric with a stand-up collar, concealed covered press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Welt side pockets, decorative seams at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in printed, appliquéd sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

V-neck tunic in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, gently dropped shoulders with front-facing shoulder seams and long, voluminous sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs. Seam at the hips with a flare to the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ribbed T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
3/4-length leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets at the front and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Empire-line dress in tulle with sequins and beaded embroidery at the top, concealed buttons at the back and wide shoulder straps layered with puff sleeves that can be pulled over the shoulders. Lined.
Cropped vest top in ribbed jersey with metal press-studs down the front.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.
Round-necked vest tops in soft jersey made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
